# automaticallyUpdatesBackgroundConfiguration

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the view automatically updates its background configuration when its state changes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var automaticallyUpdatesBackgroundConfiguration: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the cell automatically calls `updated(for:)` on its [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewHeaderFooterView/backgroundConfiguration-52wng] when the view’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewHeaderFooterView/configurationState-7xj7r] changes, and applies the updated configuration back to the view. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

If you override [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewHeaderFooterView/updateConfiguration(using:)] to manually update and customize the background configuration, disable automatic updates by setting this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Configuring the background

- **defaultBackgroundConfiguration()**: Retrieves a background configuration with system default values.
- **backgroundConfiguration**: The current background configuration of the view.
- **backgroundView**: The background view of the header or footer.
